<rule id="springboot-properties-to-quarkus-00002" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="application{profile}.{extension}" pattern="spring.datasource"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace Spring datasource property key/value pairs with Quarkus properties">
                    <message>
                        Spring datasource property key/value pairs have been detected in the application property file.

                        View advice in the Quarkus datasource guide to convert these to Quarkus datasource properties.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/datasource" title="Quarkus Datasources Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
            <where param="profile">
                <matches pattern=".*"/>
            </where>
            <where param="extension">
                <matches pattern="(properties|yml|yaml)"/>
            </where>
        </rule>
